performance_glitch_user.Observability: MEDIUM - Difficult to monitor performance states
performance_glitch_user.Unbugginess: MEDIUM - Performance issues can mask or cause bugs

error_user.Unbugginess: HIGH - Error states interfere with testing
error_user.Controllability: HIGH - Cannot reach desired application states
error_user.Explainability: HIGH - Poor error messages reduce understanding
error_user.Observability: MEDIUM - Error states may not be clearly visible
error_user.Algorithmic Transparency: MEDIUM - Error handling logic may be opaque

visual_user.Decomposability: MEDIUM - Visual components may be tightly coupled
visual_user.Explainability: LOW - Visual issues may not have clear explanations

presentationNotes.objective: Demonstrate how different failure types map to testability principles
presentationNotes.audience: Conference attendees learning about intrinsic testability
presentationNotes.keyMessage: Understanding testability principles helps diagnose and prevent common testing challenges
